review.subject: If you have a chance, do yourself a favour and come to the hotel Miranda
review.comment: The overall experience is great. We booked an offer with Brunch, beach & pool access and it was amazing. Clean beach with nice vibes overlooking Dubai eye. The brunch was great, tasty food, the grilled shrimps was AMAZING.

review.subject: Paradise
review.comment: We stayed for 3 nights, we arrived at the hotel earlier than the time, Mr. Abbas welcomed us very warmly and sincerely at the entrance, he was very helpful. Thank you very much to him. Likewise, Esra lady in the restaurant was very interested and smiling. They made us feel like we were at home.

review.subject: Paradise
review.comment: Stayed here 3 nights and absolutely loved everything about the hotel. The facilities are very clean and comfortable. The staff is very attentive, hospitable and professional. The breakfast is amazing! I loved the quality and presentation of the food.
